content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a cigarette. looked up at the night sky. observed these triangle shaped lights. looked close to see an appendage pointing out from it's right side. thought hmmm strange looking "star". looked slightly east to notice another not quite as bright as the first but with the same exact shape.. looking further east i saw yet another, altogether i counted 5 that i could see with all the exact same shape in various positions in the night sky. i just don't know what these are. seems weird that all have same shape. unlike "normal" stars.
content.summary: Triangle shaped lights with long appendage pointing north. observe several in night sky over past week. stationary, like it's observing.

content.detailedDescription: Found on google earth, uso" very large and round. landed under water leaving trails close to port royel in the bahamas.
content.summary: Seen on google earth' landed under water disk like shape also left a trail

content.detailedDescription: My gf, her little brother and i were chilling in my car and my gf and her brother at first saw a light moving in a weird direction really and. as the object was moving at very high speeds it would change direction as if it was teleporting. it seemed to disappear after every second. and then completely disappeared. when i first saw it i look at the windshield and saw an object like appeared to have flames on the end and really bright lights. i jetted out of the car because i know what i saw but i couldn't see it in detail so i tried chasing it but it was going so fast and after it went past the treetops it disappeared. all of us are still in awe at what we saw. we compared observations after it disappeared and they all matched up
content.summary: Jet fast object in the sky emitting lightning bright lights on the street. i ran after it and couldn't keep up. then it disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This incident was witnessed by my father and his brother when they were children. they were playing football in the fields near their home, near trichur. the year was 1958, and the month was april. 

while my father was playing in the fields, he looked towards the sky at the horizon, and he saw three molten flying objects dash across the sky from the se horizon. they were spinning, and he described them as 'molten metal spheres with a tail'. they were reddish orange and glowing. they were moving very fast, and by the time my father called his brother to see them they had gone off the horizon. 

as my father was explaining to his brother about the objects in the sky, and they were looking at the horizon. within the next few minutes, the three globes returned. this time they were flying in the opposite direction, and they flew past. this time my uncle also watched them fly across the sky along with my father.
content.summary: Molten flying ufo

content.detailedDescription: In the ssw about 45 degrees up, i noticed a white light about as bright as venus appears in the morning sky right now, which is very bright. i'm not sure exactly how long it had been there, but the last time i looked at that part of the sky was about 15 seconds prior to when i noticed it. it was about 1 1/2 hand widths to the left of jupiter and a little higher up. perfectly stationary. as soon as i trained my binoculars on it, it dimmed to a faint star-like light, and through the binoculars it looked just like a star and continued dimming until it was no longer visible. i continued watching that part of the sky for another 10 minutes and didn't see anything else that was unusual.
content.summary: Bright stationary venus-like light appears and abruptly fades and vanishes

content.detailedDescription: Unknown
content.summary: Move in the dark halo of the sun

content.detailedDescription: Outdoors to find the cat.Saw two extremely bright white lights like stars move vertically or ascended. they were parallel to each other or side by side. it was odd that there were two in such close proximity to each other.That's what caught my attention. i have not seen that in all my 69 years. one disappeared first the other followed. much brighter than any star in the sky.
content.summary: Brighter than venus, two very white starlike objects asended

content.detailedDescription: I was taking trash to curb sunday night and looked at stars, saw big dipper and many stars in sky. across sky to right of dipper noticed a small round white star like object moving in straight line (came from behind my house) higher than air traffic, and blinking on/off once per second. it was moving overhead east to west as fast as a military jet. could say it was at least 36,000 feet like the jets fly.  watched it a few seconds. ran to get binoculars (20 seconds?), but when returned saw it further out towards west and could not adjust binocs quickly enough to catch.  then saw second star like object moving from same area along nearly same path, but it disappeared within five or six seconds before it reached directly overhead, or it stopped blinking.  it was  fainter than the first one. got binocs adjusted to be able to see stars clearly. then looked to path of first in the west and did not see object, but saw what appeared to be a bright white blotch (like a bright white ball with irregular shape on the trailing side) the whole thing about as big as a dime held out, falling-- from my perspective it appeared to drop far behind trees/house across street but i believe it did not actually hit the ground. like watching a shooting star - they don't hit the ground. i was surprised how close it appeared - it seemed closer to me than the last point where i saw the blinking thing in the west. i even thought for a few seconds that it had been a firework type rocket shot up from behind the nearby stand of trees. but now i don't think that.   a few seconds later, i saw a triangle shaped craft with white lights blinking on/off on three points --i saw three lights blinking in triangle shape through the binocs -- and a golden light also on it near the rear of it, along with a second craft with white blinking lights and a red light, but could not determine if it was triangle like the other, flying really fast nearly side by side, then very close and it looked like the second craft flew somewhere under the triangle and very close, both going  in the same westward direction as the first blinking object.  these two craft moved across the sky faster than the white objects had moved and were seemingly chasing after the one that had gone furthest west. i think they were much lower in altitude.  i don't know if all was related but it all took place within two to three minutes' time. i did not hear any sound before seeing the silent white "blotch" (so not a fourth of july rocket set off) and did not hear jet noise when two "chase planes" went overhead.  the low hum of an air conditioner in the neighborhood could have masked that, but a small helicopter went by immediately after, moving west to east at a low altitude, and i heard it's noise. i have not seen these blinking white objects in the sky before tonight.  do you think the triangle or the other craft shot the second object  out of the sky?? thinking about it now, the ufo that "disappeared" could have been moving in that area, to follow the first one, and could have been shot down creating the "white blotch". the one triangle was flying level so i saw the lights at the three tips, but the second one was blinking lights as furiously as the other, but seemed to be on an angle, so i could not see three lights if it was a triangle shape. i guess the two westbound craft were around passenger jet altitude when on approach to phila. airport 25 miles out. the triangle and other craft flew off to the west.  amazing. that is what i saw.
content.summary: Observed starlike object moving across night sky blinking once per second, then saw second  one  coming from same area of sky

content.detailedDescription: My co worker and i looked up at about 9:40 saturday night and observed an orange bright object coming toward us from the west it made no sound and had no blinking light as it passed overhead the object seemed to be heading upwards at a slow rate we watched it until it was no longer visible it was as bright coming as going
content.summary: Myself and one other looked up and saw an orange orb

content.detailedDescription: Looking over lake ontario from stoney creek. took several pics looking different places in the sky. this one pic has 2 orbs close together. one pinkish one greenish
content.summary: 2 orbs over lake ontario

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On june 24 2017 at approx 10:45pm est, myself and five other family members were out on the patio stargazing when we noticed a very bright white light streaking across a short section of the sky. we were facing north looking out over georgian bay when we first saw the light come from the west. at first we thought it was a shooting star, until it "blinked out," and appeared slightly to the east of where we last saw it. 

it would repeat this action another 4 or so times, each time heading more eastward, heading directly away from our line of sight. there was a slight "zig zag" when it would appear and disappear, it was not traveling in a perfectly straight line. it was difficult to tell whether it was moving slightly up or down, or left or right because of how fast it was moving. we lost sight of the object as it was heading east towards wasaga beach. it was here where we did not see it come back. overall the entire event lasted 45 seconds or so.

the object made zero noise as it moved. there were also no other planes / satellites in the area at the time. the object emitted a very white light, which made it difficult to make out the exact shape and size. at arms length it would appear to be an inch in length. i do not know if this was the size of the object, or if this was then length of the "streak" it was leaving behind. 

i have been an amateur astronomer / sky watcher since i was a child. i have seen comets, meteors, satellites, the iss etc and i am at a loss to explain what it was exactly what was in the sky.
content.summary: Zippy white light over georgian bay

content.detailedDescription: I was playing with my kids in the living room, and my younger son told me there is something flying in the sky. so we all went out to see closer and it's movement was not like normal airplane or helicopter. the object was spinning by itself and saw short beams from the object several times and the object surface was flashing with lights. i thought it is very unusual thing and took a video with my iphone camera. it flew further and i could not see anymore.
content.summary: The object looked like it is spinning by itself and saw short beam from the object several times

content.detailedDescription: A blimp like object in the west sky that appeared in the picture taken in a moving vehicle. looks like a saucer. this is the narrow road on the way to hotel united 21 in kodaikanal.
content.summary: Looks like a blimp in the sky. took this in a moving vehicle. discovered it after reviewing the pics back home.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving in our van on western reserve rd coming from boardman towards canfield ohio . my husband who was driving saw nice shaped clouds   in the sky and asked me to take a picture of them . later that week i was sending him the pictures from my phone and saw that there was one  silver orb thing in the picture , i had taken 3 . i did not see the orb while taking pictures .I cant tell if it was a reflection or something actually in the sky. i just thought you could take a look at it and let us know .
content.summary: June 19 2017 picture of silver orb in sky on western reserve rd , canfield ohio

content.detailedDescription: I woke up this morning at the beach became fixed on a bright light over the ocean. light was much brighter than any star and would go from bright to dim intermittently also looked like it was traveling in and out at high speed to achieve the dimming affect. then disappeared duration about 5 minutes took photo while visible. object did not look like anything that i could debunk it with like plane or helicopter. looked weird
content.summary: Saw odd light over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: Two black military helicopters flying by, took pictures for my kid and saw object appear in photo that was only milli seconds after previous photo showed only the second helicopter. applied filter and zoomed, saw round disk shape with middle light section.  didn't see it with the naked eye while observing helicopters.
content.summary: Two black military helicopters flying by, took pictures for my kid and saw object appear in photo that was only milli seconds after previous phot showed nothing. applied filter and zoomed, saw round disk shape with middle light section

content.detailedDescription:
Google earth image, dated 4/2011, only appears on 1 image on this 50 ft long park entrance road - so i assume it was moving?
in google earch, you must be on the right side of this part entrance/parking area, about half way to the gate.  stay zoomed out when looking for the correct spot.  other images fwd and back do not show this object in sky, so i assume it moved.  could be a small model aircraft, etc.  but it is directly over an abandoded nike missle silo sf-31 in san leandro, ca.
found on google earth on 062517.
content.summary: Google earth image, dated 4/2011, only appears on 1 image on this 50 ft long park entrance road - so i assume it was moving?

content.detailedDescription:
i was in indian shores, florida taking pics of myself w/ ocean behind me, it was daytime. i did not see object at that time, only when i saw pics
later at home after uploading to pc. the object was very bright white
round sphere. i was standing in same spot mostly, but the object in the pics
seems to have moved a number of times. it shows up on my right side, my left, and high over my head. i use the sun as the reference point.

 when i zoom in on pic, the light shows a little red and green on opposite
sides. so that makes me think its not a planet. and not a star, cause they
don't move like that. anyway, there are other anomalies around the sun, that
could be a photo mess up, i can't tell exactly why those colors are there.
but the video explains what may have caused it, maybe a photo expert can tell what it is or isn't. i'm sending this just for the record. the white sphere is the reason i'm sending this. thankx
content.summary: Bright white sphere appears in self photos, it is in various positions on pics.

content.detailedDescription:
On june the 14th, at around 22:00, i was driving through ticknall when i noticed an odd light in the sky in the direction of the reservoir. 

i drove to a nearby lay-by and parked my car. there was a public footpath that leads to the reservoir so i started walking down the path to see if i could get a better line of sight. 

about 100 metres down the path i spotted the light again. it was still hovering above foremark reservoir at this point. it appeared to be about the size of a golf ball, although i believe it was bigger than that, and was glowing orange/white. almost like the flame of a candle. 

as i got closer, four smaller lights dropped out of the bottom of the main, big light and began to fly in separate directions into the woodland. i got my phone out and started recording. as i did, my phone came up with an error message stating that it was overheating and had to shut down. the video started to flicker red/pink and then my phone turned off. 

i watched the object for about 2 minutes before it started to move. it flew slowly over the trees to the west of my position and then descended. i could see the light emitted from the object shining through the trees. 

i went back to my car and drove around to the area where the object had descended. this took around 6 minutes. when i got there, there was no light source at all and the object seemed to have disappeared.
content.summary: Fireballs over foremark reservoir

content.detailedDescription: We were 14yrs old and fishing on a sand bar between 2 small bodies of water. we were having an argument about our lines when a huge object came over us and hovered. we did not know what it was because it blended in perfectly with the night sky. we were terrified. it was very big but not loud and it seemed like the water got rough. it stayed directly over us for several minutes,lifted up and moved very fast when it flew off. like a whirling rotating zing. we grab our stuff and ran back to the cabin woke everyone up. my dad thought we had an accident because we were shaking and unable to speak. we look for physical signs the next day but found none. the family cabin was on an undeveloped lake surround by bare pasture and no public road access. we have never heard the sound the object made ever again nor have we been able to recall anything further about our encounter but we both remember it like it was yesterday. it is strange because i can tell you how big it was as if i did see it and its exact flight path.
content.summary: Huge object overhead. heard and felt its size. camoflauged to night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a family meeting when suddenly we spotted a disc the size of a small plane hovering above us, glowing several colors but all of them returning to a yellow-red tone, at the beggining it just spinned, wobbling and glowing, then with no sound it made a brief slow speed flight north west before making an extremely fast move and desapeared. the number of witnesses is uncertain because many of the neighbors around the block commented some others ratheres stay anonymous
content.summary: Disc the size of a small plane hovering above us

content.detailedDescription: Well i was outside flying my dji phantom 3 drone up and down the street. as i was heading north down the street i live on, i pulled up the drone to turn it around then i noticed this big black dot in the sky. so i bring the drone back-and i let it hover over my yard. you can actually hear the drone hovering while i'm recording because i sat down the remote for the drone. and i started to record this thing/bird. i don't know what to call it. but all i know is with the naked eye i could see wings flapping. it was just over a quarter of a mile away. and it was about 300' to 400' up in the air. the video i'm submitting is 100% unedited. i do have the original video on my phone still
content.summary: It looked like a bird or dragon with no tail flying

content.detailedDescription: i had just washed the car to take photo's to put it online to sell. i didnt notice this shot until a friend looking at my advertisement on the 24th of june 2017 asked what was wrong with the paint on the bonnet...Thats when i relized this object was in the shot ...Taken with a samsung  mobile phone, there is nothing close to the car or house to create this object
content.summary: Taking photo of car to sell didnt notice this until someone looked at car advert and noticed it

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a van with the doors open so that i could touch the ground with my feat. i was at a friend's house in the the industrial area of my close-knit village. as we were talking we both noticed an unidentifiable object (smaller than a plane or helicopter) in the sky, not too high from were we were, that flew by. a rather loud noise anticipated the viewing. a few seconds later at least 3-4 helicopters followed, and the interesting part of it was that they were flying really low as we could clearly see the writings under them. they were the helicopters of the firefighters, police, military, and others that i have not seen again in my life. furthermore, a few minutes later a couple of really technologically-advanced planes that i have not seen again in my life flew really high in the sky, really fast and loud. after this, there was silence, and i have not heard of anyone else who saw it or read no article or saw no news on tv.
content.summary: An object flew at about 100 feet from me followed by helicopters and planes.

content.detailedDescription: Vacationing in north myrtle beach at approximately 8.Pm. on a weeknight in august, observed several lights heading out to sea.  noticed them immediately, then realized that they were not flying, but floating.  going in and out of view between very small patches of clouds.  very unusual.  between 6 and 10 lights separate from each other and not holding a formation of any kind.  like a flock of birds crossing a lake.  when they finally emerged from the patch of clouds the sky opened up to a clear night.  i was hoping to be able to identify them at this time, but the lights slowly faded to nothing after about 2 minutes. each light disappeared separately and on its own.  not in unison.  randomly.  sighting lasted about 3 minutes.  my sister also was with me and noticed the same unusual effect.  we were both in awe of the sighting as we both knew this was not a normal formation of craft.  we are both used to seeing crafts of all kinds as i was in the military and we grew up around three airports.  two small aircraft and helicopter ports and one international/military air base.  these were not something we ever witnessed, and we both knew it was important as it was happening.  we both seemingly knew to take it all in before speaking.  no loss of time or reality, however, i did have an excited, uneasy feeling.  seemed like something out of a movie.
content.summary: Few clouds.  appeared from behind a patch of clouds looking south.  seemingly eastward direction out to sea.  lights dissipated.  6 to 10 separate lights in all.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Hovered for 3-4 minutes then disappeared leaving a "c" shaped cloud - indicative of immediate sound barrier breaking
content.summary: Hovered for 3-4 minutes then disappeared leaving a "c" shaped cloud

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting outside together on our back porch when i turned around and saw a an orange fireball like object in the sky originally i thought it looked like a super nova (a star exploding in the sky) so i jumped up and grabbed my nikon dsl 3300 and snapped a sshot of the fireball and as soon as i did the bobject started to move from the west (where i sfirst saw it) to the east (moving closer overhead) and then i asked my husband what it was because a start wouldn't move that way. once i said something the ball looked like a slow moving exploding fireball and then the lights were just out. but we could still see the object over head. it then cot closer and closers  (northeast) that's when i could see what the bottom of the object looked like. it was a dull grey sphere with dark rings starting from the middle and getting bigger towards the outside of the object. (i also filled as much as i can but the object was too dark at this time but you can here what was said and a single orange flash from the object and one photograph that just turned out like and orange blob) and as i said that it was for sure a ufo it stopped hovering above us and it's lights went back on and it went over the trees towards the north east. as soon as i saw the object i called my mom because i thought she would be the only one to believe me and i called her at 10:33 pm saturday june 24, 2017.  it's 11:37 and i just went to upload the images from my camera to the comouter and my whole card has been corrected. i have no evidence.. even after i showed my husband the video and the images. 
of this ufo. i will afmit. i feel very uncomfortable right now as i am submitting this. and i would like a response of somekind. thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I am pretty sure this object knew i saw it. i am sure that once i acnolaged it's presents thatso when things got really weird.

content.detailedDescription: it was a clear night with the constellation extremely visible and i was sitting on my deck looking upward and enjoying the views as there was no light pollution or smog pollution to obstruct my beautiful view.  as usually i observe the sky for satellites that typically run and a north and south direction as i would have observed them in the past.  so i was facing  in an eastern direction and observed a bright yellow orb somewhere most likely in the stratosphere descending very quickly i would say almost triple the speed  of conventional gps satellites that orbit our planet.  it was 1:35 am as i marked it on my phone to confirm timing on june 25, 2017.  so this bright yellow orb descended  and conducted a 90 turn instantly with no drag or lag  in a step in motion in one direction similar to a zigzag pattern.  at one point it stopped and the closest reference point according to my astronomy app is in the algenib pegasus constellations. so the yellow orb continued on this 90 pattern back-and-forth in a step formation travelling south east and eventually losing sight  as it continued through the stratosphere further away from me.  unless this was some sort of government or military aircraft i would say that the laws of physics were certainly bent..  i can honestly say it was extremely fascinating watching this object moves so gracefully across the night sky and was the only one to observe it.   i think that's the hardest part wishing that someone else might have seen it with me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Clear night in bowmanville ontario with the constellations in great detail. i observed a bright yellow orb moving very fast for a  satellite and was making 90 turns as it moved in the north east region. these 90 turns were in a step pattern

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: An object moved from south to north around humacao to naguabo, puerto rico. also observed in the photo a bright red light at lower altitude. i took the photos from a hill very close to where i live. this is the first time i captured an unrecognized and constant red light.
content.summary: An object moved from south to north around humacao to naguabo, puerto rico. also observed in the photo a bright red light at lower altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
On the drive back home from mexico, my father and i noticed the ufo in the sky. my father took multiple pictures because he has the new iphone with a good camera. the object hovered in the same spot for a good time. approximately 1 hour and 20 minutes. also we did not notice any other objects but in one of the pictures you can see 2 more objects that looked like transparent discs that at first glance look like clouds but are to perfect in size and shape and are obviously trying to cloak themselves to great avail as we did not see the other 2 to the naked eye. but the other ufo was solid and visable. 
 i study ufology daily and i know this was an otherworldly craft. my father and i were ecstatic as we both have wanted to have a personal ufo sight all our lives.. 
finally we drove out of sight of the object as we had to be home to care for our pets.
content.summary: Off white disc/cigar shaped ufo. have multiple pictures
